snippet: BLOCK--Elaine, 85, of New York City passed away Thursday morning. Beloved mother of Alan Block, mother-in law to Nancy. Loving grandmother to Phoebe and Eadin. Cherished sister of Gerald Cohen and sister-in law Myra. Loving wife of the late Paul Block. 1/3
lead_paragraph: BLOCK--Elaine, 85, of New York City passed away Thursday morning. Beloved mother of Alan Block, mother-in law to Nancy. Loving grandmother to Phoebe and Eadin. Cherished sister of Gerald Cohen and sister-in law Myra. Loving wife of the late Paul Block. 1/3
